mods.subtitle: Updated daily, with new mods added every week.
mods.noModsMatchFilters: No mods match your current search and filters
mods.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this mod? This will remove it from your mods list and delete all files.

notifications.modContainsFiles: {{modName}} contains {{fileCount}} files. Select which ones to install.

common.failedToFetchMods: Failed to fetch mods. Try again later.

settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
settings.languageSettingsDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the appearance of the application.
settings.themeDescription: Choose between light, dark, or system theme
settings.flashbangDescription: Forces Light Mode between 8 PM and 8 AM, regardless of selected theme
settings.launchOptionsDescription: Customize the launch options for the game. These are applied regardless of the game mode selected (Vanilla or Modded).
settings.systemSettingsDescription: Mod Manager Settings. These do not affect the game.
settings.gameConfigDescription: Manage gameinfo.gi file backup, restoration, and validation for safe modding.
settings.defaultSortDescription: Choose the default sort order for the Mods page.
settings.toolsDescription: Utility functions for managing your mods
settings.confirmClearAllMods: Are you sure you want to clear all mods? This action cannot be undone.
settings.autoReapplyMods: Automatically reapply mods when the mod manager is launched.
settings.launchVanillaNoArgs: Launch the game in vanilla mode without additional arguments.
settings.createCustomSettingDescription: Add a custom setting to the game. These will be added to the game as launch options.
settings.keyDescription: Most settings are a key-value pair
settings.valuePlaceholder: true or false or any value

privacy.title: Privacy & Content
privacy.description: Control how NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is displayed and filtered.
privacy.hideNSFWDescription: Completely hide mods marked as NSFW from lists and search results
privacy.showLikelyNSFWDescription: Show content that might be NSFW but isn't explicitly marked (overrides hiding)
privacy.disableNSFWBlurDescription: Show NSFW content without any blur effect (content still shows NSFW badge)
privacy.blurStrengthDescription: How much to blur NSFW content when visible (pixels)
privacy.rememberPerItemChoicesDescription: Remember when you choose to show/hide specific NSFW items

about.title: About
about.description: Deadlock Mod Manager is a tool for installing and managing mods for the Valve game "Deadlock".
about.gamebananaDescription: Our primary mod source and the backbone of this application. GameBanana provides the comprehensive mod database and API that makes browsing, discovering, and downloading Deadlock mods possible.
about.tauriDescription: The powerful framework that enables this cross-platform desktop application. Tauri combines the best of web technologies with native performance and security.
about.shadcnDescription: Beautiful and accessible React components that provide the foundation for our modern user interface. Copy, paste, and customize to perfection.
about.tailwindDescription: The utility-first CSS framework that powers our responsive design and consistent styling throughout the application.
about.openSourceDescription: Built with amazing open source technologies including React, TypeScript, and many other libraries that make modern applications possible. Thank you to all contributors and maintainers.
about.updateFailed: Failed to check for updates, you may need to manually update the app.
about.copyright: Not affiliated with Valve. Deadlock, and the Deadlock logo are registered trademarks of Valve Corporation.

addMods.title: Add Mods
addMods.subtitle: Upload mod files. Drag & drop is supported.
addMods.dropAreaText: Drop files/folders here, or click to select
addMods.finalizeDescription: Only the name is required. You can fill the rest later.
addMods.noVpkFound: No .vpk found inside .zip â€“ stored archive for installer
addMods.noVpkFoundInContent: No VPK files found in the uploaded content
addMods.archiveWillBeProcessed: Archive will be processed during mod installation
addMods.noVpkFoundStored: No VPK found - archive stored for manual processing
